channel.title: VPS question
channel.description: if i deciede to buy a vps or dedi will they automatically portforward and host my server to that other people can log on and stuff? because i was using no-ip and it said online when I went to runelocus they like 45 min later it said offline and I didnt change anything If you can give any advice it would be much appreciated btw i have a 562 source and client and

item.title: VPS question

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The VPS would be already portfowarded. You would have to add the server onto the VPS and change the Ip to the client to the VPS ip.
